name: Lars' Protocol Droid
Text: '''Device'' on Harvest may be treated as ''[A New Hope] or [Hoth] droid''. While at a farm: your characters present are forfeit +3; may raise this site (if converted) to the top; and, once per move phase, may put hand in Used Pile to place a ''crop'' on Reserve Deck.(Original concept by Drew Scott - World Champion 2005)',
